homepage.headerText.message: LACChain EOSIO enables organizations and developers to build blockchain applications on the LACChain network powered by EOSIO technology.

homepage.iconBuildText.message: Build and test your blockchain applications and infrastructure.

homepage.iconBlockchainText.message: Learn about blockchain through compelling learning resources.

homepage.iconNetworkText.message: Visualize network data using the LACChain EOSIO dashboard.

homepage.porwerFulTitle.message: Discover the powerful combination of EOSIO performance and the LACChain framework

homepage.porwerFulText1.message: LACChain EOSIO deploys a public permissioned version of

homepage.porwerFulText2.message: , an open-source blockchain technology, that allows developers and organizations to test and build their decentralized applications and infrastructure.

homepage.ecosystemText1.message: LACChain EOSIO is supported by the

homepage.ecosystemText2.message: program of the IDB Lab (part of the Inter-American Development Bank) and incorporates a permissioning committee to ensure proper transparency and decentralization.

homepage.layaredNetworkText.message: LACChain EOSIO is a three-layered network. The core network comprises validator and interconnecting p2p nodes, while validator p2p out, boot nodes, writer, and observer nodes belong to the outer layers of the network.

homepage.layaredNetworkLink.message: Learn more about our network topology here

homepage.configAccountText.message: LACChain EOSIO enables you to easily create an account either as an end-user, partner, non-partner, or an app or contract developer. As a LACChain EOSIO user, you will be able to manage your account and private keys.

homepage.configAccountLink.message: Read more about LACChain EOSIO accounts

homepage.resourceModelText.message: LACChain EOSIO enables users to deploy resources when co-signing a transaction and a distribution model that allows a flexible testing environment for all users. Also, the support of the LACChain team is crucial to maintaining the network running.

homepage.readyText.message: Are you ready to start using LACChain EOSIO?

homepage.networkMonitorText.message: You can access a LACChain EOSIO network monitor to visualize both "on-chain" and "off-chain" metrics and network data.

homepage.apiIntegrationsText2.message: a robust blockchain API to stream real-time state updates, conduct lightning-fast searches and provide irreversible transaction guarantees.

homepage.blockExplorerText2.message: , a block explorer that provides access to detailed, accurate, actionable data about accounts, actions, validator nodes, and more.

homepage.nodesGenerationText.message: LACChain EOSIO offers a command-line interface to interact among the nodes and snapshots for nodes generation with no need to sync from the genesis.

homepage.dappsResourcesText.message: LACChain EOSIO provides a faucet to send resources to test dapps (decentralized apps) in our testnet, and an app developer boilerplate to create dapps within a local environment.

homepage.dappsResourcesLink.message: Find here how to obtain network resources

homepage.learningResourcesText.message: We provide an ever-growing library of resources to learn about blockchain technology, guides to start using LACChain EOSIO, and tutorials to integrate wallets.

homepage.createAccountBanner.message: Create your account and start using LACChain EOSIO.

about.headerText.message: Learn more about what we do and what you can find in LACChain EOSIO.

about.purposeText.message: LACChain EOSIO strives to offer a top-grade blockchain network for developers and organizations in Latin America and the Caribbean to explore, learn, and put to the test their decentralized apps in a secure and local environment before starting production stages.

about.whyWorkText.message: The team of LACChain EOSIO has developed a compelling network infrastructure and resources to help you get started in minutes. Also, with the support of partners and ally organizations, we have assembled a unique set of resources and tools to help you explore EOSIO blockchain technology.

about.followUs.message: Follow us to stay up to date

about.LACChain.message: is the Global Alliance for the Development of the Blockchain Ecosystem in Latin America and the Caribbean, an initiative led by IDB Lab (Innovation Laboratory of the Inter-American Development Bank group).

about.EOSCR.message: develops blockchain-based enterprise solutions deploying the EOSIO protocol. The company also offers blockchain infrastructure and learning resources for executives and developers.

about.EOSArgentina.message: has extensive experience in DPOS networks and blockchain projects, provides infrastructure, and promotes the technology. The company is a block producerin the EOS network.

about.blockOne.message: is a leading tech company that launched the EOSIO blockchain protocol in 2018. It provides technology and products that enable trust in transactions, transparency in systems, and efficiency in how the world works

about.EOSVenezuela.message: provides blockchain infrastructure in POS and DPOS systems. They are pioneers in the use of crypto and blockchain for social impact and promote blockchain in Latin America.

about.haveQuestionsTitle.message: Do you have questions about LACChain EOSIO?

about.WhatsLACChainText.message: LACChain EOSIO offers a blockchain blockchain network that integrates into LACChain. Led by Latin American technology companies, LACChain EOSIO deploys a public permissioned version of EOSIO blockchain technology to enable developers and organizations to test their decentralized applications and infrastructure within a testing environment. The LACChain EOSIO network incorporates a permissioning committee to authorize the nodes that write and validate new blocks into the blockchain. The network deploys system contracts based on the Proof-of-Authority (POA) consensus mechanism and ensures standard agreement among the nodes.

about.WhatsLACChainText2.message: LACChain is the Global Alliance for the Development of the Blockchain Ecosystem in Latin America and the Caribbean, an initiative led by IDB Lab (Innovation Laboratory of the Inter-American Development Bank group). Its goal is to accelerate the empowerment and adoption of blockchain technology to foster innovation, reduce inequalities and impact on inclusion. To do this, LACChain focuses on two main pillars: community and infrastructure. In addition, it seeks to develop and promote network interoperability, as well as to deploy and maintain interoperable blockchain infrastructures. LACChain Blockchain Networks, uses Hyperledger Besu and EOSIO technologies.

about.whatEOSIOText1.message: EOSIO is a next-generation blockchain technology launched in 2018 by Block.one, a leading technology company that provides high-performance blockchain solutions. EOSIO offers:

about.whatEOSIOText2.message: - High scalability: EOSIO allows industry-leading speed with up to 4,000 transactions per second, low block time latency rate (0.5 seconds), and Byzantine fault tolerance.

about.whatEOSIOText3.message: - Flexibility: EOSIO can deploy configurable smart contracts suitable to any business or application with custom governance and business logic and free transactions with consumption limits.

about.whatEOSIOText4.message: - Quick adaptability: The EOSIO community introduces a growing set of resources and tools for developers. Also, EOSIO smart contacts can be coded with C++.

about.whatEOSIOText5.message: - Improved security: EOSIO deploys the latest in blockchain and web security verification standards with end-to-end authentication.

about.whoBehindText.message: LACChain EOSIO was initially developed by the EOS Costa Rica and EOS Argentina teams, with the support of LACChain, a program of the IDB Lab (part of the Inter-American Development Bank). LACChain EOSIO deploys a public permissioned version of EOSIO. The team mainly comprises members of EOS Costa Rica, EOS Argentina, and advisory from LACChain, with some efforts from other organizations such as EOS Venezuela, Block.one, dfuse, and EOS Detroit.

about.howStarted.message: How to Get Started in LACChain EOSIO?

about.howStartedText.message: To create an account, first, contact our team through the contact form. We will reply as soon as possible and guide you through the following steps. To find more about how to start using LACChain EOSIO,

about.howContributeTitle.message: How to Contribute with LACChain EOSIO?

about.howContributeText1.message: You can help us assembling documentation, resources, and tools for developers.

about.howContributeText2.message: Also, we’re open to having more organizations or members working with us. Contact us.

about.createStartBanner.message: Create your LACChain EOSIO account and start building.
